pages.text: The $(thing)player tab$() is the default tab that is opened whenever the $(l:aoa3:advent_gui_base)Advent GUI$(/l) is opened.$(br)It contains an overview of the player's current $(l:aoa3:skills_overview)skills$(/l)
pages.title: Player Tab

pages.text: Clicking on any skill opens up a dedicated window, giving greater detail into the chosen skill.$(br)In the dedicated window you'll find your current xp in the skill, progression to the next level, your current cycles, and the list of $(l:aoa3:abilities)abilities$(/l) applicable to the skill.

Clicking on any ability listed in the ability pane will disable it if it is currently active, or enable it if it was previously disabled by you.$(br)Disabling an ability removes any bonuses it currently places on you, or prevents it from having any effect on the game as you play.$(br2)If you have reached level 100, a button to $(l:aoa3:cycles)cycle$(/l) the skill will be made available
